play.description: Play a song in the voice channel you are in (Stage channels are supported too!)
play.noResults: >>> {emoji.redcross} | Sorry, I wasn't able to find any results.

nowplaying.description: Shows the information about the current playing song
nowplaying.title: Now playing - {title}

bassboost.description: Sets the bassboost level for the player

filter.description: Sets the filter for the player

seek.description: Seeks the current track to the timestamp
seek.invalid: >>> {emoji.redcross} | Invalid timestamp provided, please provide a timestamp like: `10:30`

join.description: Get Stereo to join your voice channel

volume.description: Changes the volume of the player
volume.invalid: >>> {emoji.redross} | The value must be between 1 and 200.

skip.fail: >>> ðŸ”¢ | There are currently `{current}` vote(s), `{required}` vote(s) are required to skip this song.

clear.description: Clears the queue (except the current song)
